name: GPT-4 Turbo
usage: OpenAI's most capable model, great for complex tasks, coding, and creative content generation. Supports long context windows.

name: Claude 3 Opus
usage: Anthropic's most powerful model, excelling at complex analysis, long-form content creation, and nuanced conversations.

name: Claude 3 Sonnet
usage: A balanced model from Anthropic, ideal for enterprise workloads, RAG, and scaled AI deployments. Good for coding tasks.

name: Claude 3 Haiku
usage: Anthropic's fastest and most compact model for near-instant responsiveness, simple chats, and content moderation.

name: Gemini 1.5 Pro
usage: Google's latest highly capable multimodal model with long context understanding, strong in coding, reasoning, and various content types.

name: Gemini 1.5 Flash
usage: Google's fast and versatile multimodal model, optimized for speed and efficiency in high-volume tasks.

name: Mistral Large
usage: Mistral AI's flagship model, top-tier reasoning capabilities, proficient in code and multilingual tasks. Good for complex, specialized applications.

name: Mistral Small (Mixtral 8x7B)
usage: Cost-effective and efficient sparse mixture-of-experts model. Good balance of performance and cost for various tasks.

name: Command R+
usage: Cohere's highly performant model designed for real-world enterprise use cases, excelling in RAG and tool use.

name: Command R
usage: A scalable model by Cohere, optimized for RAG, tool use, and multilingual generation at a lower cost.

name: Llama 3 70B Instruct
usage: Meta's powerful open-source model, fine-tuned for instruction following, ideal for research and development. Can be self-hosted for privacy.

name: Llama 3 8B Instruct
usage: A smaller, efficient version of Meta's Llama 3, suitable for less complex tasks and on-device applications. Can be self-hosted for privacy.
